Name: azure_memoryusage_average;azure_memoryusage_count;azure_memoryusage_maximum;azure_memoryusage_minimum;azure_memoryusage_total
Description: Memory usage of the server process as used in calculating cleaner memory price. Equal to counter Process\PrivateBytes plus the size of memory-mapped data, ignoring any memory which was mapped or allocated by the xVelocity in-memory analytics engine (VertiPaq) in excess of the xVelocity engine Memory Limit.
